task: Nearby Road, pathway to unit clean and free of any slips or trips hazards (including algae)
Grounds around the pitch - hardstanding.
Hardstanding pathway to the unit door/decking?
Foundation and stands checked and in correct place?
Paving, decking, terrace and rails in good condition and not loose/wobbly?
Visible condition of unit: roof, guttering in good condition with no leaks/ brakes?
Any smell or overflow of drains?
Check the caravan hook up boxes (electric and gas)- are the lids closed and sealed and in good condition?
Visible condition of both gas bottles and regulator, check the gas bottles are not empty.
External doors all have secured steps (including patio/side doors).
All external lighting working and in good condition with shades/covers over the bulbs. (including decking lights).
Entrance door sill clean and in good condition.
All exterior doors function well, handle is secure, the locks work and the key/fobs work. (including patio/side doors).
All outdoor furniture is in good condition.
Check the dates on all smoke alarms and carbon monoxide detectors and test they are in working order.
Check the fire extinguishers, (if installed) is in date and the dial indicates green.
Check fire blanket (if installed) is in date (1yr). (Servicing date is on back of holder)
Check the function of all TVs and all TVs are tuned (Lounge/Bedrooms)
Remotes working for all TVs and all batteries included with backs on (Lounge/Bedrooms)
All furniture is in good condition (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuites and bathrooms)
All windows operate correctly and locks (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuites and bathrooms)
All blinds and curtains present and in good condition. Blind cords tied back (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuites and bathrooms)
All doors operate correctly, close and lock, check seals (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuite, and bathrooms)
Wall fittings secure (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuites and bathrooms)
Light bulbs are all working and in good condition? All light fittings are secure (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuites and bathrooms)
Anything loose or chipped? (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuites and bathrooms)
Operation and condition of cabinets and drawers in good condition? (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuites and bathrooms)
Check the function and condition of all sinks and taps, check there are no drips or leaks? (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuites and bathrooms)
Check the function of all toilets, do they flush with no consistent running water. (including ensuites).
Are all toilets and pedestals in good condition? (including en-suites).
Check the function of all taps and showers, check water pressure, ensure there are no drips. (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms and bathrooms, en-suites).
Check the condition of all taps, ensure there is no rust or runs. (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuites and bathrooms).
Check all sinks, showers and baths drain properly. (kitchen, bathrooms, en-suites).
Are all extractor fans working
Curtain rails / stall fixings all in good condition? (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuites and bathrooms)
All mirrors are in good condition (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuites and bathrooms)
Are all grouting and silicone in good clean condition? (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuites and bathrooms)
All hooks (including door) and rails in place and in good condition, not loose or broken (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuites and bathrooms)
Are all furniture, doors, handles, rails and drawers in good, safe condition? (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuites and bathrooms)
Do all radiators work and are they in good condition? (no rust) (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuites and bathrooms)
Conduct an RCD Check on the Consumer Unit. (Refer to the Electrical Safety Procedure Note for details) <Separate Quarterly RCD Check Sheet (QRCD1) Completion Required>
Are all areas of paint/wallpaper/ wallboards in good condition? (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuites and bathrooms)
Are all skirting boards and flooring in good condition? (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuites and bathrooms)
Are there any visible leaks in the ceiling, walls. Is there any damp or mildew? (kitchen, lounge, dining room, bedrooms, ensuites and bathrooms)
Is the Wi-Fi working if applicable.
Check the fuse box to see if any have tripped. (fuse box is in the master wardrobe)
Does the boiler operate from the thermostat
Function of fireplace/heater working properly?
Is the operation of the sofa-bed fully functional?
Are all fridge shelves present and in good condition?
Function and condition of hob, oven- ensure oven glass is there and not cracked.
Function of extractor, condition and filter.
Function and condition of dishwasher.
Function and condition of kettle and toaster.
Condition of work surface and edging intact.
Are all bed legs in good condition and fitted the correct way around?
Are all bed slats there and in good condition?
